TextView.android:text: Tic-tac-toe is a game for two players, X and O, who take turns marking the spaces in a 3Ã—3 grid. The player who succeeds in placing three of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game. Rules!! Since the goal is to get 3 in a row, each person must switch taking turns, first X, then O. In order to win, the 3 letters must all connect in a straight line in one direction, up or down, left or right, or diagonally.
